resources.string:
This app is implemented by using Google Mobile vision API to detect text, aim of this app is to provide easy search on NewsPaper, Magazine, Books, Screen etc. from which text can be easily readable by using device camera.
\n\n*Many Thanks to the person who told me to build this app and also thanks to the FlatIcon to provide me free icons. I respect their work.
Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Ocr dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
